quickPrompts.name: GUARDRAILS
quickPrompts.text: RULES (strict): Do not change the `components` directory structure; Do not modify or delete component CSS/code without explicit permission; Do everything locally first (push to GitHub only when I explicitly say so); Do not propose solutions that alter file structure, break CSS, or affect local preview; Before any CLI command, request approval and clearly state: purpose, working directory, and write impact. Do not run anything until I approve; Always provide step-by-step instructions; On push, GitHub must match local exactly. Do not modify local at push time; Any unavoidable differences (e.g., lockfile/meta) must be listed explicitly and wait for my approval; Không vòng vo, luôn tìm cách triệt để; Create 1 component nào đó cũng là thêm nó vào gallery nhé
